problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥形冰淇淋盒的母线长是13cm,高是12cm,则该圆锥形底面圆的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the bus bar of the cone-shaped ice cream box is N_0 and the height is N_1, then the area of ​​the bottom circle of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,圆锥的母线AB=13cm,圆锥的高AO=12cm,圆锥的底面半径OB=r,在Rt△AOB中,r=√{1^{2}-r^{2}}=√{13^{2}-12^{2}}=5(cm),∴S=πr^{2}=π×5^{2}=25πcm^{2}．故选:B．
